song.title: Everlasting God
song.lyrics:
[V] .G C G Strength will rise as we wait upon the Lord . C G We will wait upon the Lord . C G We will wait upon the Lord
[P] .G C G C D Em7 D Our God, You reign forever .G C G C D Em7 D Our hope, our Strong Deliverer
[C] .G C You are the everlasting God . Em7 The everlasting God . You do not faint . C D Em7 D You won't grow weary
[c2] .G C You're the defender of the weak . Em7 You comfort those in need . C D Em7 D G You lift us up on wings like eagles
song.presentation: V P C V P C C2 P C C2
